website_summaries.verdict: Cordless convenience for the professional and demanding DIY enthusiast. It's a powerful and versatile package complete with DEWALT's usual high quality.
pros: Robust metal construction and 4-position orbital action for faster, cleaner cutting
Comes in a smart, durable case
cons: The negatives are few – though the price will put some people off

customer_reviews.title: I like the ease of changing blades
customer_reviews.text: Saw works as advertised. I read some reviews where the owners claimed the blade came loose while operating the saw. I had this happen once, but it was because I did not have the blade fully engaged. When it is fully engaged in the collar, it will NOT come loose. Just push it in until it clicks audibly. Otherwise, I like the ease of changing blades, and I was pleasantly surprised to find a flush-cut blade in the kit. This was not mentioned in the on-line add, so it was a pleasant find. Thanks, DeWalt.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very strong cutter, nice features, battery lasts plenty for a home diy.
customer_reviews.text: I really like all the dewalt 20v tools, I now have several and can switch batteries from my circular saw and jig saw and others so I always have plenty of charged batteries for whichever tool I am using today. Works great, cutts much better then my old black and decker, but that electric black and decker is also 20 years old. This has options that were not available back then and cuts as strongly as any electric saw in my opinion.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice saw.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 15-year-old Bosch, which I loved dearly, but it was time. I have been pleased with the quality of the DeWalt so far. Battery life is okay, but the sightline is taking some getting used to, hence the 4 stars. I am a professional trim carpenter, and use this tool almost every day. Time will tell if it keeps its precision as long as the Bosch did. Balance is excellent, and it cuts very smoothly, even in a tight radius.

customer_reviews.title: Great jig saw
customer_reviews.text: Great jig saw. As mentioned in other comments, there is a small plastic piece that attaches near the blade to prevent splintering but it doesn't attach very well and should be redesigned. Other than that, this is the Cadillac of jig saws. The installation of the blade is easy. The dust blower is a nice feature. The battery life is awesome (I'm used to the old NiCd batteries).

customer_reviews.title: Blades fall out.. Even for experienced builder!
customer_reviews.text: The husband and I recently used this on a project and our initial use was quite dangerous - the blades kept falling out! We were using the correct blades and my husband is a builder by profession but even he couldn't figure out why the blades were coming out. We used Bosch and Dewalt blades. They locked in and made a clicking noise. When he pulled on them they wouldn't come out, but when we used it and made contact with the wood they would fall out! I don't get it at all. Too late to return or we probably would. Love Dewalt generally but this is a bit much.

customer_reviews.title: I love this cordless jigsaw..
customer_reviews.text: I love this cordless tool so much. I bought the Dewalt cordless "Skil" so as well. I I'm amazed how much power modern Li-On batteries have (especially the 20V ones). I don't even take a charger with me, just a spare battery. It will last all day, and the battery doesn't seem to make it heavy and difficult to use. The blades are very easy to change. But a word of caution - always remove the battery before changing the blade. Being cordless I tend to forget how much it could hurt me, if I didn't.

product_meta.title: DEWALT 20V MAX Jig Saw (DCS331M1)
product_meta.description: Style:Jigsaw KitThe DEWALT DCS331M1 20V MAX Lithium Ion Jigsaw Kit (4.0 Ah) features an all-metal lever-action keyless blade change which allows for quick and easy blade changes, along with an all-metal keyless shoe bevel with detents at 0Degree, 15Degree, 30Degree and 45Degree that provides versatility for easy bevel cutting. The 4-position orbital action provides control of cut quality and speed and variable speed 0-3,000 spm for versatility in a multitude of materials and applications. It has an adjustable dust blower that keeps the line of cut clear of chips. This jig saw also features variable speed 0-3,000 spm for versatility in a multitude of materials and applications - and accepts T-shank jig saw blades for professional results. The anti-slip comfort grip offers increased comfort and control. Kit includes: (1) DCB204: 20V MAX XR Premium Li-Ion Battery (4.0 Ah), Fast Charger, Jig saw blade and Kit bag.
